tool_description: This API allows you to interact with Reddit's data programmatically. ReddAPI is an unofficial Reddit API that grants seamless access to Reddit data, enabling effortless retrieval and interaction with posts, comments, and user activities through straightforward HTTP requests.  This powerful tool is designed for efficient large-scale scraping of public Reddit data, providing a comprehensive solution for developers.
name: ReddAPI
title: ReddAPI

api_list.name: user info
api_list.description: endpoint to retrieve a user information in JSON

api_list.name: scrape
scrape post
api_list.description: scrape post and get json data in return

api_list.name: scrape new comments with its post data
api_list.description: scrape new comments with its post data

api_list.name: scrape flairs
api_list.description: scrape flairs from any given subreddit

api_list.name: check API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reddapi.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reddapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://reddapi.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reddapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
